content: Hello,Received some Christmas give away from that site about 0.5 BTC. To activate and be able to make transactions have to deposit 0.02BTC. How do I know the site is legit? Thanks for any insights!

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: It's a classic style scam, they will keep increasing your first deposit request until your money is drained out.Let's go to the "about us" page[1], mentioned that:QuoteOur company begins its history from July 2017, when it was developed and registered by our founderWhile the whois results[2]Quote66 days oldCreated on 2022-11-11Expires on 2023-11-11Updated on 2022-12-23Avoid it.1. https://ravebitc.com/about2. https://whois.domaintools.com/ravebitc.com

comments.body: Quote from: foolazz22 on January 17, 2023, 12:00:50 AMHow do I know the site is legit? Thanks for any insights!https://ravebitc.com/No legit website will ever "give" you bitcoin and then ask you to deposit some of your own in order to unlock it. There is no something as free money just laying around waiting for you to pick it up, as simple as that.

Why don't they cut it from the 0.5 then  send you the remaining amount.
